Meeting Description: Applying to too many colleges can have adverse effects on both your applications and your sanity. We’ll review your current progress towards creating a balanced and strategically smart final list of colleges.
Agenda Item Counselor Instructions: 1. Review research on additional schools.      2. Discuss how to narrow the list & including program research.                                             3. Provide an updated list with any additional schools necessary to fill the gaps to balance the list
Task Key: comprehensive-10-2 Optional - Listen to Get Wise Podcast. Episode 7
Task Name: Optional - Listen to Get Wise Podcast. Episode 7
Content: Finalizing Your List: Part 1. How to Navigate Demonstrated Interest. Podcast Ep. 7

Agenda Item Counselor Instructions: Evaluate academic performance and identify any necessary support needed. Evaluation of study skills and determine if any additional support is necessary
Content: Goal Setting Progress Report.

Agenda Item Counselor Instructions: Discuss new avenues to pursue as needed
Revisit testing plans (adjust SAT/ACT timeline depending on scores, Subject Tests if needed, discuss AP exams and necessary prep
Revisit summer plans (decisions made on any programs, confirm student applied, discuss other local opportunities if there is no summer program)
Identify college visit opportunities in conjunction with existing family travel plans

Agenda Item Title: Status check-in: Goal Setting Progress Report
Agenda Item Counselor Instructions: Counselor to add written updates on student’s progress

For example, "Work on x applicaiton" could turn into "Work on Coalition application" and "Work on UC application"
